question: Jahangir ruled during which of the following periods?
explanation: Jahangir or Salim ruled from 1605 to 1627 A.D. Jahangir revolted against Akbar after Akbar’s death, he was crowned at Agra in 1605 A.D. He assumed the title of Nur-ud-din Muhammad Jahangir which means conqueror of the world.
